publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-141 Brian Adam: Review of Licensing Fees—That the Parliament condemns the fact that of Aberdeen City Council's taxpayers have to subsidise the council's licensing board to the tune of £184,000 each year and calls on the Scottish Executive to review licensing fees so that the licensed trade pays, in full, for the costs incurred by licensing boards.
S2M-141 Review of Licensing Fees (lodged on 13 June 2003) Michael Matheson*
S2M-141 Review of Licensing Fees (lodged on 13 June 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-141 Review of Licensing Fees (lodged on 13 June 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-141 Review of Licensing Fees (lodged on 13 June 2003) Ms Sandra White*
